member.name: IMFCameraConfigurationManager.LoadDefaults
member.summary: Loads the camera control defaults for the specified capture source.
member.param: A pointer to an in which the MF_DEVSOURCE_ATTRIBUTE_SOURCE_TYPE_VIDCAP_SYMBOLIC_LINK attribute identifies the capture source for which default control values are retrieved.
Receives a pointer to an object representing the collection of camera control default values.

returns.para: | Value | Description | |-------|-------------| | S_OK | Success | | MF_E_ATTRIBUTENOTFOUND | The MF_DEVSOURCE_ATTRIBUTE_SOURCE_TYPE_VIDCAP_SYMBOLIC_LINK attribute was not found in the IMFAttributes provided in cameraAttributes | | MF_E_SHUTDOWN | The function was called after was called. |

member.name: IMFCameraConfigurationManager.SaveDefaults
member.summary: Saves the provided collection of camera control default values.
member.param: An representing the collection of camera control default values to save.

returns.para: | Value | Description | |-------|-------------| | S_OK | Success. | | MF_E_SHUTDOWN | The function was called after was called. |

member.name: IMFCameraConfigurationManager.Shutdown
member.summary: Shuts down the camera configuration manager.
